rooms.name: Entrance Hall / Vestibule
rooms.description: A welcoming entry space with a foyer that adheres to Vastu principles by ensuring the entrance is aligned with the north-east direction.

rooms.name: Living Room
rooms.description: Open-plan living area integrated with dining, designed with ample natural light and ventilation in accordance with local norms. North-facing windows are recommended for enhanced comfort.

rooms.name: Dining Area
rooms.description: A dedicated space adjacent to the kitchen and living room, designed to maximize light and facilitate smooth flow of movement.

rooms.name: Master Bedroom
rooms.description: Spacious master bedroom with a private balcony facing east for early morning sunlight, following Vastu principles of placing the bedroom in the south-west zone. Includes built-in storage and closet space.

rooms.name: Kitchen
rooms.description: Modern kitchen designed with industrial aesthetics, incorporating functional cabinetry and ventilation that aligns with local building norms. Placement is towards the north-east to ensure positivity as per Vastu.

rooms.name: Servants' Quarters
rooms.description: A compact living space for domestic staff, equipped with basic amenities and proper ventilation and lighting, located in a quiet corner of the ground floor.

openings.name: Main Entrance Door
openings.description: The primary entrance door aligned as per Vastu for positive energy flow.

openings.name: Side Windows
openings.description: Large windows providing cross-ventilation and ample natural light, designed in accordance with local building norms.

openings.name: Service Entrance
openings.description: Dedicated entrance for domestic staff to access the servants' quarters, ensuring privacy while adhering to safety standards.
